翻.definition: to turn over; to flip over; to overturn; to rummage through; to translate; to decode; to double; to climb over or into; to cross

翻作.definition: to compose; to write words to a tune

翻來覆去.definition: to toss and turn (sleeplessly); again and again

翻供.definition: to retract a confession or testimony

翻修.definition: to rebuild (house or road); to overhaul

翻倒.definition: to overturn; to overthrow; to capsize; to collapse

翻動.definition: to flip over; to turn (a page); to scroll (an electronic document); to stir (food in a pot etc); to move things about; to rummage

翻唱.definition: to cover (a previously recorded song); cover version (of a song)

翻嘴.definition: to withdraw a remark; to quarrel

翻天覆地.definition: sky and the earth turning upside down (idiom); fig. complete confusion; everything turned on its head

翻山越嶺.definition: lit. to pass over mountain ridges (idiom); fig. hardships of the journey

翻悔.definition: to renege; to go back (on a deal); to back out (of a promise)

翻手為雲覆手變雨.pinyin: fan1 shou3 wei2 yun2 fu4 shou3 bian4 yu3
翻手為雲覆手變雨.definition: lit. turning his hand palm up he gathers the clouds, turning his hand palm down he turns them to rain; very powerful and capable (idiom)

翻拍.definition: to make a photographic reproduction of an image or document etc; a reproduction; to remake a movie or TV series; a remake; to adapt (a novel etc) as a movie; an adaptation

翻揀.definition: to browse and select; to glance through and check

翻攝.definition: to create an image or video by copying an existing one (e.g. taking a photo of a picture in a magazine, recording a video playing on a monitor, taking a screenshot of an online photo); to remake (a film or TV show)

翻攪.definition: to stir up; to turn over

翻新.definition: to revamp; a face-lift; to retread (a tire); to refurbish (old clothes); newly emerging

翻本.definition: to win back one's money (gambling etc)

翻案.definition: to reverse a verdict; to present different views on a historical person or verdict

翻桌.definition: to flip a table over (in a fit of anger); (at a restaurant) to turn over a table (i.e. to complete a cycle from the seating of one group of diners until the arrival of another group at the same table)

翻檢.definition: to rummage; to look through; to leaf through

翻江倒海.definition: lit. overturning seas and rivers (idiom); fig. overwhelming; earth-shattering; in a spectacular mess

翻湧.definition: to roll over and over (of billows or clouds)

翻然.definition: suddenly and completely (realize, change one's strategy etc); also written 幡然[fan1 ran2]

翻然悔悟.definition: to see the error of one's ways; to make a clean break with one's past

翻牆.definition: lit. to climb over the wall; fig. to breach the Great Firewall of China

翻版.definition: to reprint; reproduction; pirate copy; (fig.) imitation; carbon copy; clone

翻番.definition: to double; to increase by a certain number of times

翻盤.definition: to make a comeback; (of a doctor's assessment of the gender of a fetus) to turn out to be wrong

翻石鷸.definition: (bird species of China) ruddy turnstone (Arenaria interpres)

翻空出奇.definition: to overturn empty convention, and display originality (idiom); new and different ideas

翻筋斗.definition: to tumble; to turn a somersault

翻箱倒櫃.definition: to overturn trunks and boxes; to make a thorough search (idiom)

翻箱倒篋.definition: to overturn trunks and boxes; to make a thorough search (idiom)

翻篇兒.definition: to turn a page; (fig.) to turn over a new leaf

翻紅.definition: (of a stock or index) to turn positive; to regain popularity

翻老皇曆.definition: to look to the past for guidance (idiom)

翻老賬.definition: to turn over old accounts; fig. to revive old quarrels; to reopen old wounds

翻耕.definition: to plow; to turn the soil

翻臉.definition: to fall out with sb; to become hostile

翻臉不認人.definition: to fall out with sb and become hostile

翻舊賬.definition: to turn over old accounts; fig. to revive old quarrels; to reopen old wounds

翻船.definition: to capsize; (fig.) to suffer a setback or defeat

翻蓋.definition: flip-top (mobile phone, handbag etc); to rebuild; to renovate

翻覆.definition: to overturn (a vehicle); to capsize; to turn upside down; to change completely

翻譯.definition: to translate; to interpret; translator; interpreter; translation; interpretation; CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]

翻越.definition: to cross; to surmount; to transcend

翻身.definition: to turn over (when lying); (fig.) to free oneself; to emancipate oneself; to bring about a change of one's fortunes

翻車.definition: (of a vehicle) to flip over; (fig.) to go wrong; to flop

翻轉.definition: to roll; to turn over; to invert; to flip

翻遍.definition: to rummage through; to turn everything over; to ransack

翻過來.definition: to overturn; to turn upside down

翻閱.definition: to thumb through; to flip through (a book)

翻雲覆雨.definition: to produce clouds with one turn of the hand and rain with another (idiom); fig. to shift one's ground; tricky and inconstant; to make love

翻騰.definition: (of water, waves, emotions etc) to churn; to surge; to seethe; to somersault; to tumble; to flip; to rummage; to turn things over repeatedly
